game.name: DmC Devil May Cry: Bloody Palace Mode
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, 다운로드 가능한 콘텐츠, Steam 도전 과제, 컨트롤러 완벽 지원, Steam Cloud, Steam 순위표, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: No Devil May Cry is complete without Bloody Palace Mode! Take on wave after wave of increasingly difficult enemies.
game.shortDescriptionEn: No Devil May Cry is complete without Bloody Palace Mode! Take on wave after wave of increasingly difficult enemies.
